prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: There has been an increase in fraudulent and harmful costume jewelry appearing on the market during the current economic crisis, as people try to save money. Korálky Katlas has prepared a summary of things to watch out for when purchasing finished costume jewelry and jewelry-making components, based on reports from customers about problems and scams they've encountered both in the Czech Republic and abroad.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Fraudulent, harmful, costume jewelry, economic crisis, Korálky Katlas, jewelry-making components, scams, Czech Republic
